Term.Comment: Atom feed request
Universally unique identifier for a feed
Reference to a Web resource for the feed
Human-readable title for the feed
Human-readable description or subtitle for the feed
Summary of the Atom feed
Category associated with the feed
Author of the Atom feed
Person or other entity who contributed to the feed
Conveys information about rights held in and over the feed
The most recent instant in time when the feed was modified in a way the publisher considers significant
IRI that identifies an image that provides iconic visual identification for a feed
IRI reference that identifies an image that provides visual identification for a feed
Agent used to generate a feed
Entry within an Atom feed
Universally unique identifier for an entry
Reference to a Web resource for the entry
Human-readable title for the entry
Summary of the entry
Category associated with the entry
Author of the entry
Person or other entity who contributed to the entry
Conveys information about rights held in and over the entry
The most recent instant in time when the entry was modified in a way the publisher considers significant
Metadata for the feed source that the entry was copied from
Instant in time associated with an event early in the life cycle of the entry
Contains or links to the content of the entry
